Asset.Name: Short Sword
Asset.Description: Find another Glimmering Ruby for Shed-darr the Wise. He will give you the Short Sword in return.
Asset.ObjectiveMessage: Look for a nearby chest that contains another Glimmering Ruby.
Asset.CompletionMessage: Thank you for the Glimmering Ruby. This time, I shall reward you with the Short Sword. Go to the Inventory screen and equip it now!
Asset.DestinationObjectiveMessage: Go and speak with Shed-darr the Wise.
